column4: Gaming hardware maker Razer seeks Oct HK IPO at up to $5 bln valuation-source
column5: HONG KONG  July 12 Razer Inc  a gaming hardware maker backed by Intel Corp  and Hong Kong billionaire Li Ka-shing  plans to go public toward the end of October in an IPO that will value the company at up to $5 billion  a person familiar with the deal said on Wednesday.
